statements.statement: SELECT * FROM ProductPictureFile WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PictureFileNo=@PictureFileNo
SELECT * FROM ProductVideoFile WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE VideoFileNo=@VideoFileNo
SELECT * FROM SystemPictureFile WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PictureFileNo=@PictureFileNo
SELECT * FROM UserPictureFile WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PictureFileNo=@PictureFileNo
